label: At a ceremony in Jerusalem ordaining new two Reform Rabbis, Shulamit Aloni MK Min. Of Communications, Science and the Arts was awarded an honorary doctorate from the Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of religion (HUC-JIR).
